Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimization where the objective or constraints are nonlinear functions.

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Objective and constraints are linear
Solvability: but variables must take integer values.

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Combines linear programming with some integer-restricted variables.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimizing a convex objective over convex constraints; global optimum guaranteed.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Objective function is quadratic; constraints are linear.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Optimization over multiple stages with recursive structure.

Name: Combinatorial Optimization
Description: Optimizing over discrete structures (e.g.

Name: Stochastic Programming
Description: Objective or constraints involve random variables; seeks robust or expected performance.

Name: Robust Optimization
Description: Optimizes against worst-case uncertainty in parameters.
Solvability: Tractable if uncertainty set is simple

Name: Multi-objective Optimization
Description: Optimizes multiple conflicting objectives simultaneously.

Name: Global Optimization
Description: Search for the global optimum in non-convex or multimodal landscapes.

Name: Geometric Programming
Description: A special form of nonlinear optimization with posynomial objectives/constraints.

Name: Quadratic Constrained Quadratic Programming
Description: Quadratic objective and quadratic constraints.

Name: Second-Order Cone Programming
Description: Optimization over second-order (Lorentz) cones.

Name: Semidefinite Programming
Description: Optimization over positive semidefinite matrices.

Name: Network Optimization
Description: Optimization on graph/network structures (flows

Name: Optimal Control
Description: Optimizing control inputs over time for dynamical systems.

Name: Calculus of Variations
Description: Optimization over functions (infinite-dimensional spaces).
